tool_description: Get Animes and Mangas from MyAnimeList (Unofficial)
name: MyAnimeList
title: MyAnimeList

api_list.name: Get Anime
api_list.description: Get Anime by using the anime id from MyAnimeList. You can obtain the anime id by using search.

required_parameters.name: anime_id
required_parameters.description:
ID of the Anime.
Can be found by using the search endpoint or by searching on https://myanimelist.net/.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/anime/52991"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{anime_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Manga
api_list.description: Get Manga by using the manga id from MyAnimeList. You can obtain the manga id by using search.

required_parameters.name: manga_id
required_parameters.description:
ID of the Manga.
Can be found by using the search endpoint or by searching on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/manga/21"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/manga/{manga_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Seasonal Animes

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description:
Season that should be searched.

Default: `summer`

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description:
The year of the season.

Default is the current year.

api_list.name: Top Mangas
api_list.description:
Get the Top Mangas from multiple categories.

- Top All
- Top Manga
- Top Oneshot
- Top Doujinshi
- Top Light Novel
- Top Novel
- Top Manhwa
- Top Manhua
- Most Popular
- Most Favorited

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
The category you want to filter the top ranking mangas from.

#

#

#

#

#

So you can read the list!

api_list.name: Get Manga reviews
api_list.description: Get recent reviews of all Mangas

api_list.name: Get Anime Reviews
api_list.description: Get recent reviews of all Animes

api_list.name: Get Anime Recommendations
api_list.description:
Get recommendation pairs that contain a previous anime and a new anime that fits the previous one.
Results always contain `100` Recommendations. Next page returns the next `100` Recommendations.

api_list.name: Top Animes
api_list.description:
Get the Top Animes from multiple categories.

- Top All
- Top Airing
- Top Upcoming
- Top TV Series
- Top Movie Animes
- Top OVA Animes
- Top ONA Animes
- Top Anime Specials
- Most Popular
- Most Favorited

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
The category you want to filter the top ranking animes from.

#

#

#

#

#

So you can read the list!

api_list.name: Get Manga Recommendations
api_list.description:
Get recommendation pairs that contain a previous manga and a new manga that fits the previous one.
Results always contain `100` Recommendations. Next page returns the next `100` Recommendations.

api_list.name: Search Mangas
api_list.description:
Search for a manga using the search_query.
Search uses the search from MyAnimeList.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Search Query used by search on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

optional_parameters.name: n
optional_parameters.description:
Amount of results:
Minimum: `1`
Default: `1`
Maximum: `50`

optional_parameters.name: score
optional_parameters.description:
Minimum Score of the manga

Minimum: `0`
All Animes: `0`
Default: `0`
Maximum: `10`

api_list.name: Search Animes
api_list.description:
Search for an anime using:
- Query
- Amount (`min=1` - `max=50`)
- Minimum Score of Anime

Search uses the search from MyAnimeList.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Search Query used by search on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

optional_parameters.name: score
optional_parameters.description:
Minimum Score of the anime

Minimum: `0`
All Animes: `0`
Default: `0`
Maximum: `10`

optional_parameters.name: n
optional_parameters.description:
Amount of results:
Minimum: `1`
Default: `1`
Maximum: `50`
